translation.E ai, de boa? Meu nome é Felipe Castro,: Hey, how's it going? My name is Felipe Castro, and I can say I'm someone who is drawn to the computer screen.
translation.Me aprimorei na area de desenvolvimento: I specialized in by studying systems analysis and development at Estácio de Sá University, and took additional courses on the side. That's where I truly made progress in my projects, developing mobile apps, websites, and other end-to-end systems.
translation.Eu sempre priorizo o UX em meus desenvol: I always prioritize UX in my developments, ensuring an easy experience to user. In my opinion, for software to be classified as good, it should be minimalist, intuitive, functional, and attractive to the user, avoiding them spending too many bytes to understand what has been conveyed.
